name: Rakehell Duelist
text: You are a rakehell duelist because you’re the best at what you do. With a weapon in each hand, you rely on fast footwork and skillful parries. You scorn combatants who need half an hour to strap on heavy armor before they can do battle. By the time other warriors are ready, you can dispatch three sets of opponents and two flagons of ale. Knowing that a fight is around the corner, you make sure you’re prepared and that you enjoy life while you can.

features.duelist'sGuard(11thLevel): While wearing light armor or chainmail, you gain a +1 bonus to AC against enemies marked by you
features.mainGaucheAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can make a melee basic attack with an off-hand weapon as a free action before or after the extra action
features.markedOpportunity(16thLevel): If an adjacent enemy marked by you shifts or makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target, it grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn

flavorText: I can see that you are eager to die, but you’ll have to wait until I finish my drink.
